analysis.description: COZi.isContract (/unique_chucks/19/0xb281721d9218e0f1775494f135f1d0bdfeea181c.sol#299-305) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/19/0xb281721d9218e0f1775494f135f1d0bdfeea181c.sol:
	Contract COZi has payable functions:
	 - constructor (/unique_chucks/19/0xb281721d9218e0f1775494f135f1d0bdfeea181c.sol#146-157)
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/19/0xb281721d9218e0f1775494f135f1d0bdfeea181c.sol#157-160)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

COZi.claimToken (/unique_chucks/19/0xb281721d9218e0f1775494f135f1d0bdfeea181c.sol#275-279) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/19/0xb281721d9218e0f1775494f135f1d0bdfeea181c.sol#277-278)

COZi.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/19/0xb281721d9218e0f1775494f135f1d0bdfeea181c.sol#299-305)
